name: Le poulet ultime
description:
Le poulet ultime is a simple game, you only have to pass through a door to get on the next level. But the rules change on every levels, and there is a lot of them. 

Features : 

  • 80 levels
  • 2 Languages (Français, English)
  • A chicken
  • Basic sound fx 
  • A beautiful music
  • A lot of love

Hope you enjoy it ;)

Ps : If you find anything on the game (bug or recommendation) contact me at Lepouletultime@gmail.com.
